data.api: Choose from Mobile (uses GPS location) or Public (choose a city).
data.enable_tides: Enable tide information (You'll need to choose your marine forecast region).

data_description.api: Mobile requires API key. See https://github.com/ciejer/metservice-weather/issues/12 for details

public.description: Set up Public API for MetService integration.

mobile.description: Set up Mobile API for MetService integration.

tide_region.description: Choose your region for tide information.

data.location: Select the closest point to you for tide information.

tide_location.description: Choose a location for local tides.
